Test Name: Nanostring LYMPH3CX mRNA Gene Expression Assay for PMBCL and DLBCL
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue sections or blocks
Purpose: To quantify mRNA gene expression for the diagnosis of Primary Mediastinal Large B-Cell Lymphoma and Diffuse Large B-Cell Lymphoma.
Container: FFPE tissue block or unstained 5–10 µm sections on uncoated glass slides
Equipment: Nanostring Prep Station and Digital Analyzer
